titleStmt.title: A discourse of the conference holden before the French King at Fontain-bleau between the L. Bishop of Eureux, and Munsieur de Plessis L. of Mornay, the 4. of May 1600. Concerning certaine pretended corruptions of authors, cyted by the sayd Munsieur de Plessis in his booke against the Masse. Faithfully translated out of the French.

A discourse of the conference holden before the French King at Fontain-bleau between the L. Bishop of Eureux, and Munsieur de Plessis L. of Mornay, the 4. of May 1600. Concerning certaine pretended corruptions of authors, cyted by the sayd Munsieur de Plessis in his booke against the Masse. Faithfully translated out of the French.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward] A[llde] for Matthew Selman and William Ferbrand, and are to be solde [by Mathew Selman] in Fleete-streete, next the Inner Temple gate,

notesStmt.note: Recounts the proceedings at the conference to examine Mornay's "Trait√© de l'institution de l'Eucharistie".
Printer's and bookseller's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Mornay, Philipe de, seigneur de Plessis-Marly,
